description: React functional component defining a toolbar with controls for graph editing, such as adding/deleting nodes, undo/redo, importing/exporting JSON data, toggling read-only mode, shortcuts, backup, and restore.

methods.name: triggerImport
methods.description: Triggers the file input dialog for importing a JSON file.

methods.name: triggerRestore
methods.description: Triggers the file input dialog for restoring from a JSON or gzip file.

methods.name: onFileChange
methods.description: Handles file selection for importing JSON data, invokes onImport callback.

methods.name: onRestoreChange
methods.description: Handles file selection for restoring data, invokes onRestore callback.

methods.name: Toolbar({ onAddNode, onDelete, onUndo, onRedo, canUndo, canRedo, onImport, onExport, readOnly, onToggleReadOnly, onShowShortcuts, busy = false, onBackup, onRestore, })

ctags.name: Toolbar
ctags.signature: ({ onAddNode, onDelete, onUndo, onRedo, canUndo, canRedo, onImport, onExport, readOnly, onToggleReadOnly, onShowShortcuts, busy = false, onBackup, onRestore, })
